item.title: Tweet - 1007887061033082880
item.description: Hey fellow Twittists that know anything about #gdpr - are Non-EU companies allowed to ask you sign ‘agree to send your data to be processed in another country’ - the implication being you’re waiving your rights to GDPR protections?
